name: Glycolic Acid Anti-Aging + Exfoliator Serum 1oz
description: The powerful Glycolic Acid Serum, a fast working and gentle exfoliant that effectively evens and smoothens your complexion while infusing your skin with nourishing hydration. Vitamin E provides potent antioxidant protection to shield your skin from environmental damage while Squalane locks in moisture for long-lasting comfort. Ideal for all skin types, this multi-tasking serum helps tackle dryness, dehydration, texture issues, fine lines, and dull skin concerns with regular use twice daily. Use after cleansing and toning steps as part of your AM/PM skincare routine before moisturizer application to achieve optimal results. Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Polysorbate-20, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hylauronate, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum Extract, Phospholipids, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Lecithin, Benzyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Coenzyme Q10, Isopropyl Palmitate, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Panthenyl Peg-7 Dimethicone Phosphate Chloride, Ascorbyl Palmitate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Squalane, Phytic Acid, Acetic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Salicylic Acid, Fragrance.
